pr_title: Use state-controlled snackbar to allow easy error messages from async…

timeline.message: Use state-controlled snackbar to allow easy error messages from async clows.
Use state-controlled snackbar to allow easy error messages from async clows.
Export action creators individually like tutorial, maybe more idiomatic.
Rename callback to better match callback.

timeline.author: codefromthecrypt

replies.bodyText: This is GitHub rendering an indentation change poorly, but no change to the routes :)
replies.author: anuraaga
